# AM8Kspec

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of AM8Kspec is to make life easier when dealing with raw text output from our spectrophotometer.

## Installation

You can install the development version of AM8Kspec from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("zach-simpson/AM8Kspec")
```
